resolver-endpoint
*****************


Description
===========

An OCI DNS resolver endpoint.

**Warning:** Oracle recommends that you avoid using any confidential
information when you supply string values using the API.


Available Commands
==================

* create

* create-resolver-endpoint-create-resolver-vnic-endpoint-details

* delete

* get

* list

* update

* update-resolver-endpoint-update-resolver-vnic-endpoint-details
